name: Big Bang for the Splash Jam
name_original: Big Bang for the Splash Jam
description:
The big bang splash jam game was made by

Håvard Christensen @havchr

Matteo Spiri @MatteoSpiri

The game requires a controller, it was only tested with an xbox one controller on mac , but left analog should rotate a bar and right trigger should start a timer-bar , press it again to make perfect timing.

There is no way to lose.
